My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX & front-end development projects are based off a appreciated formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Discussing the project and understanding the problems we're trying to solve is my first step of any kinds project.

2

Brainstorming & Concept

Try to figure out the best possible solution by brainstorming and concepting is one of the best way.

3

UI/UX Planning

In this phase I plan the user experience that the website or app gonna provide.

4

Interaction

Making better interaction by understanding the user and their goals is the key step.
